backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing control layout and event log, allowing layout retrieval, updates, and event emission with size-limited history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two add-control-button UX features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, control panel visuals, fullscreen workspace, and scrollbar appearance.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up dark theme root and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme provider and rendering the control panel screen with notifications.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with validation, defaults, radio/slider settings, and layout injection.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Provider managing control layout state, syncing with backend, and exposing CRUD operations including controlled initialization.
Renders different control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signals or updates layout based on interactions. Handles edit-mode restrictions and visual states.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Thin wrapper that renders the shared add‑control button component.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Provides draggable positioning for controls in edit mode and updates their coordinates during drag events. Also shows selection borders when active.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Toggles fullscreen mode for the workspace with error handling and visual state icons. Hides itself if fullscreen is unsupported.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting the current layout to JSON and importing layouts with validation and error display. Includes version‑management UI elements.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, including ID, label, type, and radio options, with validation and layout‑saving actions.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Switches between edit mode and runtime mode with a button showing corresponding icons and styles.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamps and metadata, with manual refresh capability.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Button for adding new controls with mode and initialization gating, tooltip explanations, and modal launch behavior.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Main canvas rendering all controls inside draggable wrappers depending on mode, with empty‑state messaging when no controls exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides a context hook for managing control layout state, selection, updates, creation, deletion, and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Manages fullscreen state for a referenced element with enter, exit, and toggle helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Stores and toggles edit/runtime panel mode with persistence to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches and polls recent backend events using the actor, updating every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Emits control events via the actor and refreshes recent events on success while handling errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, fullscreen styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and generates deterministic 8‑bit codes from seeds.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration values for each control type.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Creates and triggers a download of arbitrary data as a JSON file.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, exports, and imports control layout JSON, including detailed field checks.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname access, and fullscreen detection to avoid errors in non-browser contexts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React rendering with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
Defines the main control panel UI layout with header, workspace, side panels, and footer, including mode-dependent rendering.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Contains TypeScript types for control panel layout, including control configurations and layout structure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and versioning related to restoring Add Control button behavior.
